title: Microsoft Fabric
description: Microsoft Fabric workspace service with dedicated capacity, Lakehouse, and private connectivity.

display_name.title: Name for the workspace service
display_name.description: The name of the workspace service to be displayed to users

description.title: Description of the workspace service
description.default: Microsoft Fabric is a unified analytics platform that brings together data engineering, data science, real-time analytics, and business intelligence in a single SaaS experience.

overview.title: Workspace Service Overview
overview.description: Long form description of the workspace service, in markdown syntax
overview.default:
Microsoft Fabric provides a unified analytics platform built on a lakehouse architecture.
This workspace service provisions a dedicated Fabric capacity, workspace, and default Lakehouse with private connectivity to the TRE workspace.

**Included resources:**
- Fabric Capacity (configurable SKU)
- Fabric Workspace with workspace-level private link
- Default Lakehouse
- Managed private endpoints for secure access to workspace storage

[Microsoft Fabric documentation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/fabric/)

fabric_capacity_sku.title: Fabric Capacity SKU
fabric_capacity_sku.description: The SKU tier for the Fabric capacity. Larger SKUs provide more compute power but cost more.
